original_text: Can you tell a wild ox to work for you? No! At night, it will not stay to feed at your farm. Can you tell a wild ox to work for you?
korean_text: 들소가 어찌 기꺼이 너를 위하여 일하겠으며 네 외양간에 머물겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Can you tell a wild ox to work for you?
sentences.korean_translation: 들소에게 너를 위해 일하라고 말할 수 있니?

sentences.original_text: At night, it will not stay to feed at your farm.
sentences.korean_translation: 밤에는, 그것은 네 농장에서 먹이를 먹기 위해 머무르지 않을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: Can you tell a wild ox to work for you?
sentences.korean_translation: 들소에게 너를 위해 일하라고 말할 수 있니?
